content: अवस्थित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Remained, stayed; कथमियंतं कालमवस्थिता मया विना भवती <ls>V. 4</ls>; remaining, standing firm or fixed; staying, abiding, lasting &c.; <ls>R. 6. 19</ls>; एवमवस्थिते <ls>K. 158</ls> under these circumstances. {@--2@} Firm of purpose, steady; see अनवस्थित. {@--3@} Engaged in prosecuting; following; abiding by; <ls>Ms. 8. 42</ls>, <ls>Bg. 4. 23.</ls> {@--4@} Resting with, dependent on; मयि सृष्टिर्हि लोकानां रक्षा युष्मास्ववस्थिता <ls>Ku. 2. 28</ls>; <ls>K.</ls> <ls n="K.">344.</ls> {@--5@} Settled, a matter of course; पितुरस्याः समीपनयनमवस्थितमेव <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--6@} Resolved; युद्धाय <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>
